title: Science Leadership Enhancement Course Utilizing Mobile Media

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: A customized program for science field administrators/leaders aiming to enhance self-directed learning capabilities using mobile media and cultivate scientific decision-making skills.

learning_goals: Learners can solve three or more practical science problems using mobile media (apps, videos, podcasts, etc.).
Learners can design team-based science projects by integrating mobile learning tools and collaboration platforms in BYOD environments.
Learners can perform data analysis and decision-making processes in science fields with over 80% accuracy based on mobile learning outcomes.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
